# Installation {#sec-shinyapp_installation}

Follow the steps below to install the latest development version of **mapa shinyapp** from GitHub (the script first installs *BiocManager*, *remotes*, and *mapa* if you donâ€™t have them):

```{r}
#| eval=FALSE

if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {
 install.packages("BiocManager") 
}

if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) {
 install.packages("remotes") 
}

remotes::install_github(
  "jaspershen-lab/mapa",
  dependencies = TRUE,
  repos = BiocManager::repositories(),
  upgrade = "ask"
)

remotes::install_github(
  "jaspershen-lab/mapashiny",
  dependencies = TRUE,
  repos        = BiocManager::repositories(),
  upgrade      = "ask"
)
```
